indentured.translation[0].definitions[0]: indentured lenders are ones covered by an indenture agreement when bonds are ISSUED (=made available and sold)
indentured.translation[0].definitions[1]: an indentured worker is one who must work for an employer for a long period of time, under a contract, usually for very low wages
legislation banning imports of goods made by forced or indentured child labourers
